nodes.text: Gradient Seven was a detainment moon that was used by the Galactic Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War, to house prisoners. In 1 BBY, the Imperial prison barge Purge was sent to transport prisoners to Gradient Seven, although it never arrived there.

Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, indicated during discussions that Gradient Seven was excluded from The Essential Atlas Online Companion because it is not the effective name of a world but a military code used for its designation.
